src/lib/components/DashLeaflet.react.js.description: DashLeaflet is allows to display a map in dash. Several point and line layers can be added to the map.

methods.name: getBaseLayers
methods.docblock:
Get baselayers from props and add them to the map.

@returns {*} Single baselayer as TileLayer or multiple baselayers as TileLayers in LayersControl

returns.description: Single baselayer as TileLayer or multiple baselayers as TileLayers in LayersControl

methods.description: Get baselayers from props and add them to the map.

methods.name: loadLines
methods.docblock:
Load lines from an array of objects containing geometry (as geojson), layer title, popup property and icon source.

@returns {Array} of Layer overlays containing feature groups of provided lines

returns.description: of Layer overlays containing feature groups of provided lines

methods.description: Load lines from an array of objects containing geometry (as geojson), layer title, popup property and icon source.

methods.docblock:
Return a leaflet icon element when provided with a source of an image.

@param source
methods.description: Return a leaflet icon element when provided with a source of an image.

returns.description: of Layer overlays containing feature groups of provided points

methods.description: Load points from an array of objects containing geometry (as geojson), layer title, popup property and icon source.

id.description: The id of the main element

style.description: The style of the main element

mapOptions.description: The style of the main element

baselayer.description:
The baselayer(s) of the map. Can either be a single one or an array of multiple baselayers including their name.
     If no baselayer is provided, the OSM will serve as default.

lines.description:
Array containing one or many shapes of:
     - geom: Array of GeoJSON objects containing lines that are to be rendered on the map.
     - title: Title of line layers that are to be rendered on the map.
     - popup: Property name that is to be rendered in the popup of the lines.

lines2.description:
Array containing one or many shapes of:
     - title: Title of line layer that is to be rendered on the map.
     - geom: Array of arrays containing lines that are to be rendered on the map. These can either be lines or polylines.
     - popup: Property name that is to be rendered in the popup of the lines.
     - color: Color of the line on the map.
     - weight: Weight of the lines.
     - opacity: Opacity of the lines.

points.description:
Array containing one or many shapes of:
     - title: Title of point layer that is to be rendered on the map.
     - geom: Array of arrays containing coordinates ([lat, lng]) of points that are to be rendered on the map.
     - popup: String containing popup-text for this layer group or list of strings containing popup-texts
     - icon: Shape for the icon that is to be rendered for the points. Attention, the iconUrl must be an
     external link and cannot be a relative link.
